page.title: 11The Old Rectory St.Audries
page.content: The Old Rectory was built in 1864 it is a{residential training centre } for the{disabled.}It takes people from school leaving age upwards.At the moment it has 27 residents and 25 staff.Most of its{residents stay {permanently at the hostel.}It has:a main room,dining room,kitchen,games room, classroom,small bar,laundry room,craft room,and a sitting room.The bedrooms are huge but each one holds a maximum of 2 people to accomadate wheel chairs etc. A{new extension}was completed Christmas 1984.The hostel has 1 large St.Bernard dog.It was a hotel until used for the disabled.Its residents have regular walks and activates and spend hardly any time at the centre. The managers name is Mr.Petts. He looks after the running of the centre.
